mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMMENTS_P WHERE CP_NUM = #{cp_num} AND CP_EMAIL = #{cp_email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments_p(CP_PNUM, CP_NUM, CP_PCNUM, CP_EMAIL, CP_CONTENT, CP_CRDATE, CP_UPDATE, CP_NICKNM) VALUES (#{cp_pnum}, seq_commentsp_num.nextval, #{cp_pcnum}, #{cp_email}, #{cp_content}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{cp_nicknm})
mapper.select: SELECT CP_PNUM, CP_NUM, CP_PCNUM, CP_EMAIL, CP_CONTENT, CP_CRDATE, CP_UPDATE, CP_NICKNM FROM COMMENTS_P WHERE CP_PNUM = #{cp_pnum} ORDER BY CP_PCNUM ASC, CP_NUM ASC
